app.title: BenefitsBot
app.tagline: Find benefits and tax credits you may qualify for
app.subtitle: Answer a few questions to see which programs could help you and your family. Free, private, no login required.
app.privacy: Your answers stay on your device. We never store or share your information.

screener.stateQuestion: What state do you live in?
screener.householdSizeQuestion: How many people live in your household? (Include yourself, your spouse, and anyone you support financially.)
screener.incomeQuestion: What is your household's total annual income before taxes? (Your best estimate is fine.)
screener.incomeHelp: Include wages, salary, tips, self-employment income, and any other regular income for everyone in your household.
screener.pregnantQuestion: Is anyone in your household currently pregnant?
screener.childrenUnder5Question: Do you have any children under 5 years old?
screener.childrenUnder18Question: Do you have any children under 18?
screener.numChildrenQuestion: How many children under 18 are in your household?
screener.disabilityQuestion: Does anyone in your household have a disability?
screener.filingStatusQuestion: What is your tax filing status?
screener.retirementQuestion: Do you contribute to a retirement account (401k, IRA, etc.)?
screener.collegeQuestion: Are you currently enrolled in college at least half-time?

results.title: Your Results
results.taxCreditsTitle: Tax Credits You May Qualify For
results.freeFilingSubtitle: Don't pay for tax prep â€” these resources are free for you:
results.noResults: Based on your answers, you may not qualify for the programs we checked. However, eligibility rules are complex and vary by state. We recommend contacting your local benefits office or dialing 211 for more help.
results.disclaimer: This tool provides estimates only. Actual eligibility is determined by the agencies that run these programs. Income limits and benefit amounts may change. Always apply directly to confirm your eligibility.
results.dial211: You can also dial 2-1-1 for free referrals to local assistance programs.
